description:
On the uphills, you get hot, so you layer down. On the downhills, you get cold, so you layer up. Not anymore! The Xenair Alpine Light Jacket efficiently balances body temperature and eliminates the need to constantly change layers. Primaloft® Gold Active+ insulation is so light, compressible and warm you'd swear it was down, but it retains the water resistance and durability of synthetic fibres.

  • Lightweight Pertex® Quantum Air nylon shell packs down small and provides excellent water and wind resistance
  • Body-mapped Primaloft® Gold Active+ synthetic insulation provides 60 g in the front, back, top of sleeves and collar and 40 g through the sides, underarms, spine and top of hood
  • Helmet-compatible hood with a semi-elasticated opening for a secure fit
  • Articulated patterning for unrestricted movement
  • 2 zippered hand pockets and chest pocket hold essentials
  • Low-profile elastic cuffs provide a seamless fit when wearing gloves
  • Adjustable hem seals in heat
  • Stuffs into its own pocket for easy storage in your backpack when conditions warm up
name: Rab Xenair Alpine Light Jacket - Women's
